Text:
Resolution 720x480 (MPEG-1?) not digitally remastered so you see every grain of the film. You get 2 trailers, 3 audio streams (dolby 1.0 mono, dolby 2.0 stereo, dolby 5.1 surround) and you can have the film commented by Hopper, Fonda and Lewis or only by Hopper.

If you are only after watching the movie, get another release. This is not bad, but better ones, higher resolution are avaible. 

If you are about atmosphere of 60-70s cinema theatre, than get this. Still not shure if it is worth the huge download.
